attributes.action: prohibit the religious communities of Great Britain to influence Scientific Research
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Scientific community of Britain is under constant assault from religious denominations, especially in regards to Genetic research. This is wrong and a hinderance to scientific progress. Since the scientific community does not decree what is included in mass or sermons, why should the reverse be true.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
